sqlMap.select: SELECT c.merchant, c.name as mname, c.phonenum, c.email, c.telephonenum, c.weixin FROM contacts c where c.access_node_id=#id#
SELECT code FROM cloudwifi_manage.user_district_rel where userid=#userid#

select aadneip.* ,auth.ipaddr from ( select aadne.*, c.merchant, c.name as mname, c.phonenum, c.email, c.telephonenum, c.weixin from ( select aad.*, ane.hardware_ver, ane.software_ver, ane.gwip, ane.premodel_ip
from ( SELECT a.id, a.NAME, a.mac, a.remote_addr, a.sys_memfree, a.update_time, a.last_seen, a.redirect_url, a.portal_url, a.sys_upload, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.configflag, a.cmdline, a.ssid, a.time_limit, a.lat, a.developer, a.cmdflag, a.long as long1, a.sys_uptime as uptime, ad.province, ad.city, ad.district, ad.detail FROM access_nodes a LEFT JOIN addresses ad ON a.id = ad.access_node_id
(ad.province=#pcode#
AND ad.city IN
#cityCodes[]#
AND ad.district IN
#districtCodes[]#
)
and a.mac=#mac#
) aad LEFT JOIN access_nodes_exp ane ON aad.id = ane.access_node_id ) aadne LEFT JOIN contacts c on aadne.id = c.access_node_id ) aadneip LEFT JOIN cloudwifi_manage.authservers auth on aadneip.mac = auth.node_mac order by aadneip.last_seen desc
LIMIT #pagenum#,#pagesize#

select aadneip.* ,auth.ipaddr from ( select aadne.*, c.merchant, c.name as mname, c.phonenum, c.email, c.telephonenum, c.weixin from ( select aad.*, ane.hardware_ver, ane.software_ver, ane.gwip, ane.premodel_ip
from ( SELECT a.id, a.NAME, a.mac, a.remote_addr, a.sys_memfree, a.update_time, a.last_seen, a.redirect_url, a.portal_url, a.sys_upload, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.configflag, a.cmdline, a.time_limit, a.lat, a.ssid, a.developer, a.cmdflag, a.long as long1, a.sys_uptime as uptime, ad.province, ad.city, ad.district, ad.detail FROM access_nodes a LEFT JOIN addresses ad ON a.id = ad.access_node_id
ad.province = #province_code#
ad.city = #city_code#
ad.district = #district_code#
a.id =#id#
a.name like '%$name$%'
a.mac like '%$mac$%'
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.created_at)>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#starttime#)
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.created_at)<=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#endtime#)
(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#online#)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.last_seen))<70
(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#outline#)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.last_seen))>=70
) aad LEFT JOIN access_nodes_exp ane ON aad.id = ane.access_node_id
ane.software_ver like '%$software_ver$%'
ane.hardware_ver like '%$hardware_ver$%'
ane.gwip like '%$gwip$%'
ane.ssid like '%$ssid$%'
) aadne LEFT JOIN contacts c on aadne.id = c.access_node_id
c.merchant like '%$merchant$%'
) aadneip LEFT JOIN cloudwifi_manage.authservers auth on aadneip.mac = auth.node_mac
auth.ipaddr like '%$ipaddr$%'
order by aadneip.last_seen desc
LIMIT #pagenum#,#pagesize#

SELECT code, name FROM cloudwifi_manage.user_district_rel
userid =#userid#
level =#level#
order by code

SELECT code, name FROM cloudwifi_manage.addr_province where code in
#codeList[]#
order by code

SELECT code, name FROM cloudwifi_manage.addr_city where province_code in
#codelist[]#
order by code

SELECT code, name FROM cloudwifi_manage.addr_district where city_code in
#codelist[]#
order by code
select merchant_name from merchant_info where id=#id#

select * from $tablename$ where 1=1
userid=#userid#
id=#id#
mac like '%$mac$%'
code like '$code$%'

select * from $tablename$ where 1=1
userid=#userid#
id=#id#
mac like '%$mac$%'
code like '$code$%'

select * from $tablename$ where 1=1
userid=#userid#
id=#id#
mac like '%$mac$%'
code like '$code$%'

select * from $tablename$ where 1=1
userid=#userid#
id=#id#
mac like '%$mac$%'
code like '$code$%'
sqlMap.update: update protocol_set_log set authenticate=#authenticate#, offline_judge=#offline_judge#, heartbeat=#heartbeat#, visitor_num=#visitor_num#, set_time=#set_time#, execute_time=#execute_time#, set_result=#set_result#, runtime=runtime+1 where id=#taskid#
update internet_limit_log set whitelist_ip=#whitelist_ip#, set_time=#set_time#, execute_time=#execute_time#, set_result=#set_result#, runtime=runtime+1 where id=#taskid#
update portal_set_log set portalname=#portalname#, set_time=#set_time#, execute_time=#execute_time#, set_result=#set_result#, runtime=runtime+1 where id=#taskid#
update upgrade_ctrl_log set cmd_flag=#cmd_flag#, set_time=#set_time#, execute_time=#execute_time#, set_result=#set_result#, runtime=runtime+1 where id=#taskid#
sqlMap.select: select * from confs where access_node_id=#apid#
select access_node_id, group_concat($str$ separator ';') as publicip from $table$ where access_node_id =#apid# GROUP BY access_node_id
select * from portal_set_log where apid=#apid#

select pi.id,pi.portal_name,pi.redirect_url,pi.portal_url from cloudwifi_manage.user_district_rel udr, portal_info pi where udr.userid=#userid# and pi.state='1' and (udr.code = pi.provice_code or udr.code = pi.city_code or udr.code = pi.district_code) GROUP BY pi.id
SELECT SUM(incoming) AS incoming, SUM(outgoing) AS outgoing FROM connections WHERE access_mac=#mac# AND expired_on > now()
select district from addresses where access_node_id=#apid#
select merchant from contacts where access_node_id=#apid#
